scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/scripts && mkdir dist/data
scripts.copy: cp -al app/*.html dist/; cp -al app/data/* dist/data
scripts.serve: npm run clean & npm run watch:js && watch 'npm run copy'
scripts.watch:js: watchify app/scripts/main -p [ parcelify -wo dist/styles/main.css ]-dv -o 'exorcist dist/scripts/main.js.map > dist/scripts/main.js --base ./scripts'
